summary: Used to be great but is now abandoned

description: This software loads raw files and corrects the exposure and colour. The current versions, instead of saving or transferring to GIMP in full resolution, it generates random resolutions. I cannot find a pattern in its behaviour. If I keep trying, eventually, I get what I want.
summary: This thing used to be great

description: I use it to convert Nikon Raw images from my Nikon cameras. Works really well. Nothing to it.
